statements: SELECT * FROM Urban_Planning_Projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM Urban_Planning_Projects ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM Urban_Planning_Projects WHERE budget > 50000;
SELECT * FROM Urban_Planning_Projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, deadline FROM Urban_Planning_Projects ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM Urban_Planning_Projects WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY project_id DESC
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Urban_Planning_Projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND deadline < '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM Urban_Planning_Projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%road%'
SELECT project_id, project_description, start_date FROM Urban_Planning_Projects WHERE budget BETWEEN 10000 AND 20000 ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT project_id, project_name, deadline FROM Urban_Planning_Projects WHERE budget > 15000 ORDER BY deadline DESC
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'Completed';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(project_id), COUNT(*) FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY project_name DESC, project_status ASC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(task_id) AS task_count FROM projects LEFT JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT MAX(project_id) AS max_project_id FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, task_name FROM projects JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id ORDER BY project_name ASC, task_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PublicProjects;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM PublicProjects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_location FROM PublicProjects WHERE project_location='New York';
SELECT manager_id, manager_name, manager_email FROM ProjectManagers WHERE manager_id='1a2456e5-2a76-45cf-859c-5137a3a618f4';
SELECT task_id, task_description, task_status FROM ProjectTasks WHERE task_status='In Progress';
SELECT * FROM PublicProjects WHERE project_id = 'abc123';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM PublicProjects WHERE project_location = 'New York';
SELECT manager_name, manager_email FROM ProjectManagers WHERE manager_id = 'def456';
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM ProjectTasks WHERE task_status = 'pending' ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_location, manager_name FROM PublicProjects JOIN ProjectManagers ON PublicProjects.project_id = ProjectManagers.project_id WHERE manager_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Projects;
SELECT infrastructure_name, infrastructure_type FROM Infrastructure;
SELECT monitoring_date, monitoring_details FROM MonitoringData;
SELECT stakeholder_name, stakeholder_role FROM Stakeholders;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT infrastructure_name, infrastructure_type FROM Infrastructure ORDER BY infrastructure_id DESC;
SELECT monitoring_id, monitoring_date, monitoring_details FROM MonitoringData WHERE monitoring_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT stakeholder_name, stakeholder_role FROM Stakeholders WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY stakeholder_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, budget, start_date FROM Projects;
SELECT contractor_id, contractor_name, address FROM Contractors ORDER BY contractor_id DESC;
SELECT task_description, start_date, end_date FROM Tasks WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT inspection_date, inspector_name, inspection_result FROM Inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass';
SELECT project_name, budget FROM Projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT contractor_name, address, phone_number FROM Contractors WHERE contractor_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT task_description, start_date, end_date FROM Tasks ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT inspection_date, inspector_name, inspection_result FROM Inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Passed' ORDER BY inspection_date ASC;
SELECT cost_description, amount FROM Costs WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
